mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CHATROOM( CHATROOM_CODE,CHATROOM_PARTI,CHATROOM_CREDTEDAT) VALUES( (SELECT NVL(MAX(CHATROOM_CODE), 0) + 1 FROM CHATROOM),#{empCodes},SYSDATE)
mapper.select: SELECT CHATROOM_CODE, REGEXP_REPLACE(CHATROOM_PARTI, '^'||#{empCode}||'(,|$)|(,)'||#{empCode}||'(,|$)', '') AS CHATROOM_PARTI FROM CHATROOM WHERE REGEXP_LIKE(CHATROOM_PARTI, '(^|,)' || #{empCode} || '(,|$)')

SELECT cr.CHATROOM_CODE, REGEXP_REPLACE(cr.CHATROOM_PARTI, '^'||#{empCode}||'(,|$)|(,)'||#{empCode}||'(,|$)', '') AS CHATROOM_PARTI, cr.CHATROOM_CREDTEDAT, COALESCE(MAX(c.CHAT_TIME), cr.CHATROOM_CREDTEDAT) AS LAST_ACTIVITY_TIME FROM CHATROOM cr LEFT JOIN CHAT c ON cr.CHATROOM_CODE = c.CHATROOM_CODE WHERE REGEXP_LIKE(cr.CHATROOM_PARTI, '(^|,)' || #{empCode} || '(,|$)') GROUP BY cr.CHATROOM_CODE, cr.CHATROOM_PARTI, cr.CHATROOM_CREDTEDAT ORDER BY LAST_ACTIVITY_TIME DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CHAT (CHAT_CODE, CHATROOM_CODE, CHAT_CONTENT, CHAT_SENDER, CHAT_TIME) VALUES ((SELECT NVL(MAX(CHAT_CODE), 0) + 1 FROM CHAT), #{chatroomCode}, #{chatContent}, #{chatSender}, SYSDATE)
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM CHAT WHERE CHATROOM_CODE = #{chatroomCode} ORDER BY CHAT_CODE ASC
SELECT CHAT_CONTENT FROM ( SELECT * FROM CHAT WHERE CHATROOM_CODE = #{chatroomCode} ORDER BY CHAT_CODE DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM = 1
